summary: A group enters a supermarket at closing time, shoots around and takes hostages. They believe aliens have arrived there then. Cops arrive outside.
cast: Carlos Bernard|Mathew St. Patrick|Rockmond Dunbar|Courtney Ford|Jeffrey Licon|Samantha Streets|Derek Basco|Bonita Friedericy|Bryan Krasner|Keith Hudson|Joel McCrary|Joseph Steven Yang|Philip Newby|Tom Kiesche|Laura Cordova|Mark Anthony Vazquez|Roberta Bassin|Tom Noga|Travis Guba|McKay Stewart|Andrew Ableson|Matthew R. Anderson|Kathleen Parker
title: Alien Raiders
